seo.title: Welcome to my portfolio
seo.description: Welcome to my portfolio. I'm Valentin Gindre, a web developer who likes to make accessible websites and even design them in his free time. And I love it!

heading.title:
Hi! I'm Valentin, 
web developer
heading.subtitle: I make accessible websites and even design them in my free time. And I love it!

1.title: I develop
1.description: Specialized in Nuxt (Vue 3) with TypeScript, I have also worked on projects in Angular and React. I design modern interfaces, maintainable and performant, adapted to the needs of the project.

2.title: I design
2.description: I imagine fluid and accessible user experiences, relying on design systems like Tailwind CSS or Angular Material. Each interface is designed mobile-first and accessible to all.

3.title: I optimize
3.description: I ensure accessibility, performance and SEO. Fast loading, HTML structure, good practices and SSR rendering: everything is designed for a smooth and visible experience.

4.title: I collaborate
4.description: I integrate easily into a team and communicate efficiently with designers, developers and clients, whatever the project context.
